Title: Isolated Castle
Credits: Framework Created by Adam Smith (amsmith@ucsc.edu), story developed by Benjamin Nguyen.

CastleBedroom.Body: You awake in what appears to be an medival bedroom, fit for a king.

CastleHallway.Body: You enter a grand hall way, spacious enough to hold thousands.

Choices.Text: Look for food in the Dining Hall

Balcony.Body: You enter the balcony, and notice you are ontop of a mountain, only able to see the clouds and pigeons.

DiningHall.Body: You see hundreds of tables lined up with perfectly spaced plates, forks, and more, yet no food to be served other than some baskets of bread.

Choices.Text: Go back to the Castle Hallway

GreatHall.Body: The main entrence hall into the castle, usually filled with people but devoid of anything particular except a locked door to the outside.

Choices.Text: Go back to the Castle Hallway

Kitchen.Body: You enter the kitchen, where food is prepared yet see an empty kitchen.

Choices.Text: Go back into the dining hall

Gatehouse.Body: You escaped the isolated castle, yet you still feel lonely in contrast to life.
